pkgmetadata.longdescription: Zig-Zag Sampler // Implements the Zig-Zag algorithm with subsampling and control variates (ZZ-CV) of (Bierkens, Fearnhead, Roberts, 2016) arXiv:1607.03188 as applied to Bayesian logistic regression, as well as basic Zig-Zag for a Gaussian target distribution, and Bouncy Particle Sampler for a Gaussian target.
